talents.description: Damaging multiple enemies in one swing grants temporary health. Max 5 enemies.

talents.name: Spirit-Binding
talents.description: Melee killing blows grant temporary health based off the health of the enemy slain.

talents.name: Fiery Fortitude
talents.description: Healing yourself with health items heals nearby allies for 20% of their maximum health. Clears wounds.

talents.name: Exhaust
talents.description: The Burning Head also removes all overcharge.

talents.name: Bonded Flame
talents.description: The Burning Head grants 50 temporary health when used.

talents.name: Fiery Heart
talents.description: Reduces the cooldown of The Burning Head by 30%.

passives.name: Blood Magic
passives.description: 50% damage taken transfered to Overcharge.

passives.name: Slave to Aqshy
passives.description: No Overcharge slowdown.

passives.name: Unstable Strength
passives.description: Increased melee power on high Overcharge.

passives.name: Blazing Sinews
passives.description: Reduced block cost on high Overcharge, consumes Overcharge.

skill.name: Living Bomb
skill.description: Sienna explodes, dealing damage to surrounding enemies and clearing her Overcharge.

talents.name: Backblast
talents.description: Increases effective block and push arc by 50%.

talents.name: Form of the Fire Wind
talents.description: Increases max overcharge by 25%.

talents.name: Volcanic Body
talents.description: Increases maximum health by 20%.

talents.name: Feuerbach's Fury
talents.description: Successful charged melee attacks grant 40% increased stamina regeneration for 2 seconds.

talents.name: Essence Syphon
talents.description: Clears any wounds and converts temporary health to permanent health when bosses die.

talents.name: Seared Nerves
talents.description: Revived allies take 50% less damage for 10 seconds.

talents.name: Dissispate
talents.description: Reduces damage taken from venting overcharge by 50%.

talents.name: Conduit
talents.description: Increases rate of venting overcharge by 50%.

talents.name: Natural Talent
talents.description: Reduces overcharge generated by 15%.

talents.name: Seething Embers
talents.description: Critical hits grant temporary health.

talents.name: Soul Snare
talents.description: Kills grant temporary health.

talents.name: Blazing Harvest
talents.description: When bosses die, gain health.

talents.name: Flame Wave
talents.description: Increases the radius of Living Bomb explosion by 50%.

talents.name: Blazing Crescendo
talents.description: Increase the explosion damage of Living Bomb.

talents.name: Tick, Tick, Tick...
talents.description: Reduces the cooldown of Living Bomb by 30%.

melee_traits.name: Heroic Intervention
melee_traits.description: Assisting an ally under attack grants both players a damage shield for a short time

melee_traits.name: Off Balance
melee_traits.description: Blocking an attack increases the amount of damage the attacker takes by 50% for 3 seconds

melee_traits.name: Opportunist
melee_traits.description: Increases push strength by 50% against an attacking enemy

melee_traits.name: Parry
melee_traits.description: Timed blocks reduce stamina cost by 100%

melee_traits.name: Resourceful Combatant
melee_traits.description: Melee critical hits reduce the remaining cooldown of your career skill by 2%

melee_traits.name: Swift Slaying
melee_traits.description: Critical melee strikes increase attack speed by 20% for 5 seconds

range_traits.name: Barrage
range_traits.description: Consecutive attacks against the same targets boosts attack power by 5% for 5 seconds

range_traits.name: Heat Sink
range_traits.description: Reduce overheat by 4 on critical hits

range_traits.name: Hunter
range_traits.description: Critical hits increase attack power by 25% against targets with the same armor class for a short time

range_traits.name: Inspirational Shot
range_traits.description: Headshots restore stamina to nearby allies

range_traits.name: Resourceful Sharpshooter
range_traits.description: Ranged critical hits reduces remaining cooldown of your career skill by 2%

necklace_traits.name: Barkskin
necklace_traits.description: Reduces damage taken by 50% for 10 seconds after using healing supplies

necklace_traits.name: Hand of Shallya
necklace_traits.description: Healing an ally with a medpack also heals you for 35% of your missing health

necklace_traits.name: Healers Touch
necklace_traits.description: 25% chance to not consume healing item on use

necklace_traits.name: Natural Bond
necklace_traits.description: Grants passive health regeneration but can no longer heal yourself

necklace_traits.name: Shallya's Boon
necklace_traits.description: Increases effect of healing on you by 30%

charm_traits.name: Concoction
charm_traits.description: Drinking a potion grants the benefits of all possible potions (effects only last half as long)

charm_traits.name: Decanter
charm_traits.description: Increases the duration of potion effects by 50%

charm_traits.name: Home Brewer
charm_traits.description: Grants base 25% chance to not consume potion when drinking

charm_traits.name: Proxy
charm_traits.description: Consuming a potion spread the effect to the nearest ally

trinket_traits.name: Grenadier
trinket_traits.description: 25% chance to not consume a used bomb

trinket_traits.name: Shrapnel
trinket_traits.description: Grenades cause hit enemies to take 20% increased damage for 10 seconds
